name: ARTificial (itch) (MIqbalKalevi)
description:
An AI that uses HRNG based algorithm to produce art.

Instruction:

1. Enter the AI drawing duration in main menu in SECONDS

2. The program will run automatically and after it finishes it will store a screenshot of the finished art which you can access on /ARTificial/ARTificial_Data/ARTificial *random number*.png

3. After step number 2, the program will automatically reset the canvas and start over with the same duration and it will keep doing so until you close the program. It does this so you can input short durations without the need to reset manually everytime.

for further questions, DM me on INSTAGRAM
